div.span: Daily Orchestration - What Happens Each Day

1. Check Status
Check results from yesterday's requests

div.style: color: white; display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap;

div.span:
Mark Job Complete
Advance to next billing cycle

Job stays in queue
Will retry today

2. Send ADR Requests
For jobs where today >= Next Run Date

3. Verify Credentials
For jobs due in next 7 days

Create helpdesk ticket
Mark Credential Failed

4. Create Jobs
For accounts due soon

5. Sync Accounts
Import updates from source

div.style: color: white; display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap;
